Module hanyaeger.api
Package com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.scenes

Class StaticScene

java.lang.Object
com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.scenes.StaticScene
All Implemented Interfaces:
Activatable, Clearable, DependencyInjector, Destroyable, Effectable, TileMapListProvider, Initializable, DimensionsProvider, EntityCollectionSupplier, SupplierProvider, YaegerScene
Direct Known Subclasses:
DynamicScene
public abstract class StaticScene
extends java.lang.Object
implements YaegerScene, SupplierProvider, TileMapListProvider, EntityCollectionSupplier, DependencyInjector
A StaticScene is the abstract superclass of all scenes that do not require a Game Loop. If a Game Loop is required, extend a DynamicScene.

    • addEntity

      protected void addEntity​(YaegerEntity yaegerEntity)
      Add an YaegerEntity to this YaegerScene.

      This method can only be used to add an instance of YaegerEntity during initialisation.If one should be added during the game, a EntitySpawner should be used.

      Parameters:
      yaegerEntity - The YaegerEntity to be added.

    • setStage

      public void setStage​(javafx.stage.Stage stage)
      Description copied from interface: YaegerScene
      Set the Stage on this YaegerScene. A YaegerScene will only be added to the Stage when the YaegerScene is the one that is being shown. Only when a YaegerScene is added, its width and height are available. Thus, to make it possible to request the width and height during the YaegerScene.setupEntities() methods, we need the Stage at an earlier stage. That is why we actively set the Stage on each YaegerScene that is created.
      Specified by:
      setStage in interface YaegerScene
      Parameters:
      stage - The current Stage.

    • setBackgroundColor

      public void setBackgroundColor​(javafx.scene.paint.Color color)
      Description copied from interface: YaegerScene
      Set the background color of the YaegerScene. When both the background color and a background image are set, the color is not visible.
      Specified by:
      setBackgroundColor in interface YaegerScene
      Parameters:
      color - The Color of the background.

      Set the background image file.
      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      url - The name of the image file, including extension. Although many different file types are supported, the following types are preferred:
      • jpg, jpeg
      • png

    • setBackgroundAudio

      public void setBackgroundAudio​(java.lang.String url)
      Description copied from interface: YaegerScene
      Set the background audio file. Currently only *.mp3 files are supported. The audio file will be looped indefinetly, until the YaegerScene is destroyed.
      Specified by:
      setBackgroundAudio in interface YaegerScene
      Parameters:
      url - The name of the audio file, including extension.

    • setBrightness

      public void setBrightness​(double brightness)
      Description copied from interface: Effectable
      Set the brightness of the whole YaegerScene. The value should be a value between -1 and 1, inclusive.

      The brightness adjustment value. 

            Min: -1.0 Completely dark
      Max: +1.0 Fully bright
      Specified by:
      setBrightness in interface Effectable
      Parameters:
      brightness - The brightness as a double, between 0 and 1.

    • getBrightness

            Min: -1.0 Completely dark
      Max: +1.0 Fully bright
      Specified by:
